name: Tuliza FM
review: We are Glad To express our gratitude To Reggae artist obsa And his Management For allowing us To Host The artist And Traveling Long distance To Meru,kenya For our Reggae show In our Tuliza studio's.From approaching him for this interview to the interview itself obsa stand's out as an humble artist.His song writing stand's out , he's a 9story teller in his music which attracts his musical fans.His willingness to share his upringing and life experiences leaves people motivated and hopeful for what the future holds. winieTheEmpress Radio Host:Tuliza FM

name: Wakstikitaka
review: It was a pleasure hosting Obsa on our Reggae Show Wakstikitaka on Radio Citizen. What stood out for me about him is his background. His personal life story and he was able to share that with us on Air. Most Artists will not want to share that, they only want to share the Glamour.He's down to earth and a really good Artist. He knows how to connect with his audience and is full of good Vibes.
